Synchronize your account: Synchronize your account to fetch your data from the cloud
Sign out problem: There was a problem signing out
Different devices desc: You can manage your budgets using your different devices
No data loss desc: Your data is backed up remotely
Delete budget?: Do your really want to delete this budget?
Expenses will be deleted: All expenses linked to this budget will be deleted
Name: Name
Invalid input JSON: Invalid input format. Expected a JSON file with following format {budgets, categories, expenses}
Import from JSON: Import your data from previously saved data in JSON file
Download JSON file: You can download all data saved in this app as JSON file
Still add amount in base: You can still add the amount in budget base currency
Error converting to base: Error calculating amount in base currency
Connect to get last rates: You must be connected to Internet to get last currency rates
Track your expenses Desc: It helps you to verify how your expenses stick to your budget
Add issue to github: Do not hesitate to add issues or requests at Github
Expenses Out desc: List with expenses out of budget dates range
